name: Noggle Statue - Boril
description: A small wobbly statue of Boril, a Grineer Foreman.

languages.description: Eine kleine Wackelfigur von Boril, einem Grineer Aufseher.
languages.name: Noggle-Statue: Boril

languages.description: Une petite statue à tête oscillante de Boril, un Contremaître Grineer.
languages.name: Statuette Noggle - Boril

languages.description: Una statuetta del caposquadra Grineer Boril con la testa tremolante.
languages.name: Statuetta Noggle - Boril

languages.description: 그리니어 감독관 보릴의 갸웃거리는 작은 인형입니다.
languages.name: 노글 스태츄 - 보릴

languages.description: Una pequeña y tambaleante estatua de Boril, un capataz grineer.
languages.name: Estatua Tambaleante - Boril

languages.description: 一小座Boril 摇头娃娃，是一名 Grineer 的领班。
languages.name: Boril 摇头娃娃

languages.description: グリニアの親方、Borilのボブルヘッド人形。
languages.name: Boril ボブルヘッド

languages.description: Mała, chwiejna figurka Borila, majstra Grineer.
languages.name: Figurka Noggle — Boril

languages.description: Uma estatueta articulada do Boril, um capataz Grineer.
languages.name: Estatueta: Boril

languages.description: 一小座 Boril 的搖頭娃娃，是一名 Grineer 的領班。
languages.name: Boril 搖頭娃娃

languages.description: รูปปั้นตุ๊กตาหัวโยก Boril หัวหน้าคนงาน Grineer ขนาดเล็ก
languages.name: รูปปั้น Noggle - Boril

languages.description: Grineer Foreman, Boril, küçük oynar figür.
languages.name: Noggle Heykeli - Boril
